ygData.subject: Bug in MatchesFilePatternDecideRule for Heritrix 3?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I have been looking at the MatchesFilePatternDecideRule in Heritrix 3 and all patterns start with .*(?i)( . . Shouldn t it be .*(?i)( . ? An example :

Subject: Bug in MatchesFilePatternDecideRule for Heritrix 3?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=432736498; y=3VqbPBkNql354_YFlhCxeKDsQ51N0WZb9adcxI8QqzZQknAhR6R8M4-fBQ

Hi,

I have been looking at the MatchesFilePatternDecideRule in Heritrix 3 =
and all patterns start with ".*(?i)(\\.". Shouldn't it be ".*(?i)(\." ?

An=
 example : "http://msoft.com/door.doc" would be matched by ".*(?i)(\.doc" b=
ut not by ".*(?i)(\\.doc".

Bertrand
